metadata.name: RISK
metadata.description:
Title: Risk  
Editions: 1/1  
Artist: YhQ Photos  
License: Extended Editorial  
Resolution: 5498 x 8247

The nature of astrophotography is such that when you have those specific set of conditions; weather, moon phase, milky way alignment, you have to risk your time to make the most of them. 

This was taken at Tongariro National Park, a 5 hour drive to one of the darkest locations in New Zealand, but also one of the most unpredictable, with hourly changes to weather forecast. This area can go from clear skies to blizzard conditions in a blink of an eye. 

Luckily all the planning came to fruition and the risk paid off, with one of the best skies I have had the fortune of being under, not a breath of wind nor cloud to be seen, and only a light sprinkling of frost underfoot!

Being able to capture these images for the world to see, is just one part of the motivation, the other is trying to preserve these wild places for generations to come. With this being the case 10% of the sale will be going to local conservation charities.  
Not only that, but the collector of this piece will get a signed A3 sized print.


Extended Editorial License: Can be used to display privately, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The License includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
